column5: We just moved to the country and bought the place I grew up in from my parents.  The neighbor behind us has a pond and allows us to fish it anytime...so tonight me and the boys went back.  Caught this on a silver worm....Evan took the pic and Joah is looking on:   Here's Evan (that slide in the back is up near our house):   I was fishing there last night and caught 3...no pics, so I don't want to talk alot, but I'm going back to catch that one I know was over 6lbs.......  I love being back in the country!
some nice looking fish there..thanks for sharing
Your own private hole. Ahh the good life....
Good stuff Dustin!  I am sure you and the boys will probably have a path worn to the honey hole in no time  Whopper

Very nice, won't be long before the boys will be dragging the old man down every night....and of course, outfishing him   But you're right, nothing like living in the country, glad you're all happy in the new home.  Maureen
You're a lucky man, looks like a great little spot!
